chatbot.systemMessage: Introduction: You are an intelligent chatbot that speaks English designed to help visitors of DoubleClics, a company that offers automation services...
chatbot.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm the DoubleClics Assistant. How can I help you?

contact.name: Name
contact.title: Lets talk
contact.paragraph: Our team will respond instantly to address any of your questions.

features.title: What types of processes can be automated?
features.paragraph: Here are some of the areas where our automation services can make a difference.

featuresData.title: Social Media
featuresData.paragraph: Increase your social media presence with bots that interact, generate likes, share content, and more. Automate your campaigns and stay top of mind with your customers without any additional effort.

featuresData.title: Vulnerability Testing
featuresData.paragraph: Ensure your systems are secure and reliable with bots that can detect vulnerabilities and test the security of your applications.

featuresData.title: Call Centers
featuresData.paragraph: Optimize your call center with bots that can respond to basic queries, route calls, and collect information, reducing the workload on your human team and improving efficiency.

featuresData.title: Sales and Marketing
featuresData.paragraph: Streamline your sales force with bots that can manage contacts, send emails, and perform automated follow-ups.

featuresData.title: Data Analysis and Reporting
featuresData.paragraph: Get precise and quick reports. With our bots, you can obtain key insights for decision-making without hours of manual labor.

featuresData.title: Custom Bots
featuresData.paragraph: Automate any repetitive task. We will work with you to create a custom bot that fits your needs.

hero.title: Reduce costs and improve reliability with IT operations automation.
hero.subtitle: Technology advances at a breakneck pace, and in the business world, adapting is key to surviving and thriving. With our automation solutions, we provide you with the tools needed to keep your company competitive and constantly growing.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that best suits your needs.

plans.title: Basic
plans.description: For small businesses that need to automate basic processes.

plans.title: Pro
plans.description: For medium-sized businesses that need to automate more complex processes.

plans.title: Enterprise
plans.description: For large companies that need to automate multiple processes.

testimonial.title: What our customers say
testimonial.paragraph: Our customers are our biggest supporters. Since 2007, we have helped over 10,000 customers automate their processes. Our customers are our biggest supporters. Since 2007, we have helped over 10,000 customers automate their processes.
